Package hipsterhighway

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Away
    This class generates the final frame of game setup before the game actually begins.
    CharacterInfo
    This class contains all of the character data which is updated throughout the course of the game and is referenced in all other classes in order to determine game events.
    CreateCharacter  
    CreateTranspo
    This class draws the select transportation frame of the character creation function.
    HelpMenu  
    HipsterHighway
    This is the main class which calls all subsequent classes of Hipster Highway.
    MainMenu  
    Map  
    RunGame
    This class contains the function RunGame, called by main, which runs the actual game components.
    Store
    This class generates the store frame, and is repeatedly called anytime a purchase is made.
    WelcomeName
    This class draws the profession frame of the create character function
